mapper.select: SELECT id FROM tc_notify_job WHERE dedup_key = #{dedupKey} AND del_flag = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, biz_type, biz_id, dedup_key, payload, channel, status, retry_count, next_run_time, remark FROM tc_notify_job WHERE status = 0 AND next_run_time <= NOW() ORDER BY next_run_time LIMIT #{limit} FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED
mapper.update: UPDATE tc_notify_job SET status = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tc_notify_job SET next_run_time = #{nextRunTime}, retry_count = #{retryCount}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
